lead_paragraph: At a time when pitchers are pampered like thoroughbreds Corey Kluber is an old-fashioned workhorse for the Cleveland Indians and will carry the load in a decisive Game Seven in the World Series against the Chicago Cubs.

headline.print_headline: Indians' Workhorse Kluber Ready to Saddle Up for Game 7
headline.main: Indians' Workhorse Kluber Ready to Saddle Up for Game 7

snippet: At a time when pitchers are pampered like thoroughbreds Corey Kluber is an old-fashioned workhorse for the Cleveland Indians and will carry the load in a decisive Game Seven in the World Series against the Chicago Cubs....
